select a.*, b.ci_name, c.bimg_file_name as bi_img, d.si_summary from book_info a left outer join category_info b on a.bi_ci_seq = b.ci_seq
left outer join ( select * from book_img where bimg_is_img = 1 group by bimg_bi_seq ) c on a.bi_seq = c.bimg_bi_seq left outer join summary_info d on a.bi_seq = d.si_bi_seq where bi_name like '%${keyword}%'
